title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
description: Forest helps you stay focused by planting trees as you work. If you remain productive, your tree flourishes; if you leave, it withers. A gamified focus app that reduces distractions and boosts motivation.

title: SmPlan: ToDo List with Reminder
description: SmPlan is a powerful to-do list app with reminders. Organize tasks, set deadlines, and stay productive with recurring notifications and a clean interface for daily planning.

title: FLIP - Focus Timer for Study
description: FLIP helps students and professionals use the Pomodoro method to improve focus. Track study hours, analyze time data, and join global study challenges for motivation.

title: Pomocat - Cute Pomodoro Timer
description: Pomocat makes productivity fun with a Pomodoro timer and adorable cat animations. Stay focused and motivated while enjoying a cute, distraction-free timer experience.

title: Time Planner: Schedule & Tasks
description: Time Planner combines task scheduling, routines, and habit tracking into one app. Organize daily life with customizable time blocks and analyze productivity with reports.

title: Flip Clock: World Clock
description: A stylish flip clock and world clock app. Perfect for minimalist time tracking, global time zones, and creating aesthetic desk setups with retro-inspired visuals.

title: Morning Habits - Daily Routine
description: Morning Habits helps you build a structured daily routine with reminders for exercise, journaling, meditation, and self-care to start your day positively and productively.

title: Focus Plant: Pomodoro Forest
description: Focus Plant gamifies focus with Pomodoro timers and cute plants. Stay productive while growing and collecting plants in a virtual garden as you complete tasks.

title: Alarmy - Alarm Clock & Sleep
description: Alarmy is a unique alarm clock app with fun challenges to get you out of bed. Solve puzzles, take photos, or complete tasks to disable the alarm and wake up fully.

title: To-Do List - Schedule Planner
description: An all-in-one to-do list and schedule planner. Create tasks, set reminders, and organize your life with recurring schedules and intuitive productivity tools.

title: To Do List
description: A lightweight to-do list app with easy task creation, reminders, and task prioritization. Great for personal use and daily productivity without extra clutter.

title: WaterDo: To Do List & Schedule
description: WaterDo is a unique to-do list app where tasks appear as water bubbles. Pop them to mark as done, making productivity fun and stress-free with gamified visuals.

title: Taskito: To-Do List & Planner
description: Taskito provides a simple timeline-based task manager. Add notes, reminders, and repetitive tasks to stay organized with both work and personal projects.

title: To-do list - tasks planner
description: A practical tasks planner to manage daily to-dos with categories, priorities, and reminders. Helps maintain focus on both short-term and long-term goals.

title: Disciplined - Habit Tracker
description: Disciplined helps you create and maintain positive habits. Track progress, set streaks, and stay accountable with reminders and detailed habit statistics.

title: Digital Detox: Focus & Live
description: Digital Detox locks your phone to help you reduce screen time. Set challenges to break phone addiction, focus better, and live a healthier, balanced lifestyle.

title: Routine Planner, Habit Tracker
description: Routine Planner is an all-in-one habit tracker and daily planner. Build consistent routines, track progress, and achieve long-term goals with reminders and charts.

title: Time Timer Visual Productivity
description: Time Timer uses visual countdowns to improve focus and productivity. Popular for students, teachers, and professionals needing simple time management.

title: YourHour - ScreenTime App
description: YourHour tracks your screen usage and helps fight phone addiction. Get daily reports, usage insights, and challenges to balance your digital life.

title: Timelog - Goal & Time Tracker
description: Timelog allows you to set goals and track time spent on different activities. Ideal for professionals and students to measure productivity and growth.

title: HabitNow Daily Routine Planner
description: HabitNow helps track habits and daily tasks with streaks, reminders, and progress reports. Build routines to improve productivity and personal growth.

title: Motivated: Habit Tracker
description: Motivated helps you form new habits and break bad ones with reminders, streaks, and motivational quotes. Stay inspired and consistent every day.

title: Listok: To do list & Notes
description: Listok combines to-do lists and note-taking. Capture ideas, set tasks, and manage personal or work projects with ease in one simple app.

title: Sectograph. Day & Time planner
description: Sectograph visualizes your day as a clock dial. Plan tasks and events in a circular timeline, making time management simple and visually intuitive.
